name: tm32
effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.
